page.title: 18PROGRESS IN PADBURY
page.content: One of the most important, if not the major, event of 1985 in Padbury must be that the gas main has arrived. A gas pipe is finally being laid down the main street, a fact which is welcomed by many. That this is due, in part, to the efforts of a builder building new houses at one end of the village may persuade some older residents that there are some advantages in new housing after all. Something else which is welcomed by all residents is the Padbury Newsletter. Published by the village, for the village, the newsletter is delivered to every household every other month. It gives a resume of past events and all the relevant information about coming events. For the last two years the front cover has shown photographs or drawings of old Padbury of interest to us all.
